question:
Jack downloaded 10 songs and 2 books for $48, Jill downloaded 15 songs and 1 book for $44. How much did Jack spend on books, if all songs are the same price and all books are the same price?
(A) $14
(B) $20
(C) $28
(D) $29
(E) $30
